participant_1.background:
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
i write in my spare time.
i like to build things.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i m a veteran.

participant_2.background:
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
i have a lot of style.
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
i m getting married in six months.
i read a lot of used books.

content.text: What is your passion for music?
I love to play the piano! I have been playing since I was 5 years old.
That is great! I love to write in my spare time.
What kind of things do you write about?
I write mostly poetry and short stories. I also like to write scripts for short films.
That's awesome! I am getting married in six months.
Congratulations! I hope it's a beautiful wedding.
Thank you! I am sure it will be. I'm looking forward to spending the rest of my life with my fiance.
That's great! I am sure you will be very happy together.
I am so happy! I can't wait to see what the future holds for us.
I'm sure it will be wonderful. Congratulations again!
